"He was taken by a group called the trainers. They turned him against 
the other Maximals and named him Slayer." Lunarpine was angry ay 
himself for letting Slayer escape he should have finished him when he 
turned his back. Lunarpine wanted to personally butcher the entire 
Trainer unit but knew that he wouldn't have the chance for a while. 
He decided to change the subject. "So how good are you at controlling 
your powers?"

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> Ice::
> "What happened to Striker? He was a good friend."
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, cyberwolf4@p... wrote:
> > "Don't worry Ice, We'll be going back. Striker was my friend. I 
> will 
> > have Slayers head." He wasn't sure just how he'd find them but he 
> was 
> > sure that Slayer would stain his claws once again.
> > 
> > 
> > 
> > Veratis studied the CR Chamber results since Lunarpines return. 
> There 
> > was DNA on Lunarpines claws that didn't belong to him. From the 
> looks 
> > of things it was another wolf.(Slayer) Now Veratis had DNA from 
> three 
> > different wolves. He wondered what would happen if all three were 
> > injected into one being. He already had one problem to deal with 
so 
> > he didn't try.
> >
